mapper.sql: a.uid, a.uname, a.upassword, a.joint_id, a.unick, a.utel, a.uverification, a.ustatus, a.utype, a.uparent_id, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.last_login_time, a.last_login_ip, a.uavatar, a.uregion_id, a.uprovince_id, a.uregion_path, a.uaddress, a.ubirthday, a.ugenter, a.membership_id, a.supplier_type, a.qrcode_url, a.qrcode_update

SELECT u.uid, u.uregion_id, u.uavatar, u.unick, u.utel, u.supplier_type ,u.ugenter, u.uparent_id, u.ubirthday, u.joint_id, u.uverification, u.membership_id, u.uname,u.upassword,r.id as ROLE_ID, r.name as ROLE_NAME, m.id as MENU_ID, m.action_name as PERMISSION_NAME FROM td_user as u left join td_user_role as ru on ru.uid=u.uid left join td_role as r on r.id=ru.rid left join td_role_permission as pr on r.id = pr.rid left join td_menu as m on m.id = pr.pid
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into td_user (uname, upassword, joint_id, unick, utel, uverification, ustatus, utype, uparent_id, create_time, update_by, update_time, last_login_time, last_login_ip, uavatar, uregion_id, uprovince_id, uregion_path, uaddress, ubirthday, ugenter, membership_id, supplier_type, qrcode_url,qrcode_update) values (#{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jointId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{utel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uverification,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ustatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{utype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{uparentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uavatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uregionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uprovinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uregionPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ubirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{ugenter,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{membershipId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{qrcodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrcodeUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
